mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP (EMP_ID, CRT_DT, CRTR, MDFY_DT, MDFYR, USE_YN, DEL_YN, F_NM, BRTHDY, EML, PHN, PSTN_PRD, PRFL_PHT, HR_DT, HR_PRD, ADDRSS, EMPLMNT_STTS, ADMN_YN, PWD_CHNG_DT, LTST_LGN_IP, LTST_LGN_DT, PWD_SALT, PWD, PSTN_ID, JOB_ID, DEP_ID, L_NM, LGN_CNT, FAIL_DT, DTL_ADDRSS, PST_CD) VALUES (#{empId}, SYSDATE, #{crtr}, SYSDATE, #{mdfyr}, 'Y', 'N', #{fNm}, #{brthdy}, #{eml}, #{phn}, #{pstnPrd}, #{prflPht}, #{hrDt}, #{hrPrd}, #{addrss}, #{emplmntStts}, #{admnYn}, SYSDATE, '', '', #{pwdSalt}, #{pwd}, #{pstnId}, #{jobId}, #{depId}, #{lNm}, 0, '', #{dtlAddrss}, #{pstCd})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PWD_CHNG_DT <= SYSDATE - 90
SELECT PWD_SALT FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND FAIL_DT >= SYSDATE - 1/24
SELECT LGN_CNT, TO_CHAR(FAIL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FAIL_DT FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{_parameter} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT, CRTR, TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT, MDFYR, USE_YN, DEL_YN, F_NM, BRTHDY, EML, PHN, PSTN_PRD, PRFL_PHT, TO_CHAR(HR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') HR_DT, HR_PRD, ADDRSS, EMPLMNT_STTS, ADMN_YN, TO_CHAR(PWD_CHNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PWD_CHNG_DT, LTST_LGN_IP, TO_CHAR(LTST_LGN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LTST_LGN_DT, PWD_SALT, PWD, PSTN_ID, JOB_ID, DEP_ID, L_NM, LGN_CNT, TO_CHAR(FAIL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FAIL_DT FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId} AND PWD = #{pwd} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT E.EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(E.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT, E.CRTR, TO_CHAR(E.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT, E.MDFYR, E.USE_YN, E.DEL_YN, E.F_NM, E.BRTHDY, E.EML, E.PHN, E.PSTN_PRD, E.PRFL_PHT, TO_CHAR(E.HR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') HR_DT, E.HR_PRD, E.ADDRSS, E.EMPLMNT_STTS, E.ADMN_YN, TO_CHAR(E.PWD_CHNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') PWD_CHNG_DT, E.LTST_LGN_IP, TO_CHAR(E.LTST_LGN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LTST_LGN_DT, E.PWD_SALT, E.PWD, E.PSTN_ID, E.JOB_ID, E.DEP_ID, E.L_NM, E.LGN_CNT, TO_CHAR(E.FAIL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FAIL_DT, E.DTL_ADDRSS, E.PST_CD, CE.F_NM CRTR_F_NM, CE.L_NM CRTR_L_NM, ME.F_NM MDFYR_F_NM, ME.L_NM MDFYR_L_NM, J.JOB_NM, D.DEP_NM, P.PSTN_NM, CMCD.CD_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM EMP WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND EMP_ID = #{_parameter}) E JOIN EMP CE ON CE.EMP_ID = E.CRTR JOIN EMP ME ON ME.EMP_ID = E.MDFYR JOIN DEP D ON D.DEP_ID = E.DEP_ID JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_ID = E.JOB_ID JOIN PSTN P ON P.PSTN_ID = E.PSTN_ID JOIN CMN_CD CMCD ON CMCD.CD_ID = E.EMPLMNT_STTS

SELECT D.DEP_ID, E.EMP_ID, E.F_NM, E.L_NM, E.EML, E.PHN, E.PRFL_PHT, E.EMPLMNT_STTS, E.DEP_ID, E.BRTHDY, J.JOB_NM, D.DEP_NM, P.PSTN_NM FROM DEP D INNER JOIN EMP E ON D.DEP_ID = E.DEP_ID INNER JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_ID = E.JOB_ID INNER JOIN PSTN P ON P.PSTN_ID = E.PSTN_ID WHERE D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND E.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND D.DEP_ID = #{depId}
AND E.F_NM LIKE '%' || #{fNm} || '%'
AND E.EMP_ID NOT IN (SELECT TM.EMP_ID FROM TM_MBR TM WHERE TM.TM_ID = #{tmMbr.tmId} AND TM.DEL_YN = 'N')

SELECT E.EMP_ID PK_COL, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY E.CRT_DT || E.EMP_ID DESC) RNUM, E.EMP_ID, TO_CHAR(E.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT, E.CRTR, TO_CHAR(E.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT, E.MDFYR, E.USE_YN, E.DEL_YN, E.F_NM, E.BRTHDY, E.EML, E.PHN, E.PSTN_PRD, E.PRFL_PHT, TO_CHAR(E.HR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') HR_DT, E.HR_PRD, E.ADDRSS, E.EMPLMNT_STTS, E.ADMN_YN, TO_CHAR(E.PWD_CHNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PWD_CHNG_DT, E.LTST_LGN_IP, TO_CHAR(E.LTST_LGN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LTST_LGN_DT, E.PWD_SALT, E.PWD, E.PSTN_ID, E.JOB_ID, E.DEP_ID, E.L_NM, E.LGN_CNT, TO_CHAR(E.FAIL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FAIL_DT, E.DTL_ADDRSS, E.PST_CD, CE.F_NM CRTR_F_NM, CE.L_NM CRTR_L_NM, ME.F_NM MDFYR_F_NM, ME.L_NM MDFYR_L_NM, J.JOB_NM, D.DEP_NM, P.PSTN_NM, CMCD.CD_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM EMP WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND EMP_ID = #{empId}
AND F_NM LIKE '%' || #{fNm} || '%'
AND EMPLMNT_STTS = #{emplmntStts} ) E JOIN EMP CE ON CE.EMP_ID = E.CRTR JOIN EMP ME ON ME.EMP_ID = E.MDFYR JOIN DEP D ON D.DEP_ID = E.DEP_ID JOIN JOB J ON J.JOB_ID = E.JOB_ID JOIN PSTN P ON P.PSTN_ID = E.PSTN_ID JOIN CMN_CD CMCD ON CMCD.CD_ID = E.EMPLMNT_STTS
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP SET LGN_CNT = LGN_CNT + 1 , FAIL_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
UPDATE EMP SET LGN_CNT = 0 , FAIL_DT = '' WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}
